issue.title: Harness after advancing checkpoint can fail to exit state 4

content.raw: Urf.  Just got a failure, using r697 with issue_213 and lower_leak applied.  I start the sim, then request T3CP1.  latestAnkleForce peaks at about 423, and then settles on a steady state of about 293.  So can't blame this one on the ms2 branch, because I wasn't using it.  Note that this is my 4th or 5th run of this same procedure, so it's happening perhaps 20-25% of the time.  So...maybe 400?
